issue.title: [Java][Gandiva] Expose Dremio build and tests as new optional container/test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3887](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3887). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Dremio uses Arrow Java and Gandiva extensively and could provide additional test coverage for the project. We should find a way to expose the downstream build of Dremio as an optional build so major changes can better be evaluated against downstream effects.

 

`[~praveenbingo]`, assigning to you for now but let's figure out who at Dremio can pick this up.
